description: Houthi attacks on commercial vessels caused major rerouting via Cape of Good Hope.

mitigation_taken.action: Emergency airfreight for semiconductors + expedited partial order from spot market
mitigation_taken.outcome: Partial — BMW SLA maintained, VW delayed 4 days

lessons_learned: Pre-position 45-day buffer for SEMI-MCU-32 before Q4. Airfreight contract needed.

description: PlastiMold Vietnam reported cash flow issues; delayed 2 shipments without notice.

mitigation_taken.action: Emergency order from secondary supplier MoldTech Thailand

lessons_learned: Qualify backup supplier in Thailand. Monitor SUP-003 health score monthly.

description: Heightened military tensions led to export uncertainty for Taiwan semiconductors.

mitigation_taken.action: Pre-emptive buffer build — 60-day stock of SEMI-MCU-32 acquired
mitigation_taken.outcome: Success — no disruption materialized but buffer provided insurance

lessons_learned: Taiwan geopolitical signals should trigger immediate buffer build given single-source dependency.

description: Suez Canal shipping lane disruption (+16 day delay) combined with low inventory (12 days) for critical single-source component SEMI-MCU-32 from SemiTech Asia in Taiwan.
lessons_learned: To be determined based on outcome.

description: Suez Canal blockage causing 16-day average delay, impacting critical component SEMI-MCU-32 with only 12 days of inventory on hand.
lessons_learned: To be determined based on outcome.
To be determined based on outcome.

description: Red Sea shipping disruption causing 16-day delay for critical SEMI-MCU-32 from single-source supplier SemiTech Asia. Inventory 12 days. Total financial exposure $1,832,000.

mitigation_taken.action: Emergency Airfreight (1600 units SEMI-MCU-32) and alternative supplier qualification initiated.

lessons_learned: To be determined based on outcome.

description: Red Sea shipping lane DISRUPTED, causing 16-day delay for critical SEMI-MCU-32. Inventory runway is 12 days, leading to a 4-day production gap.

mitigation_taken.action: Emergency Airfreight for 1600 units of SEMI-MCU-32.

lessons_learned: To be determined based on outcome.
